name: shc
vs: precision highp float; precision highp int; uniform mat4 pmat; uniform mat4 vmat; uniform mat4 wmat; attribute vec3 position; attribute vec3 normal; attribute vec2 uv; varying vec3 vPos; varying vec3 vNor; varying vec2 vUv; void main() { vPos = position; vNor = normalize(mat3(wmat) * normal); vUv = uv; gl_Position = pmat * vmat * wmat * vec4(position, 1.0); }
fs: precision highp float; precision highp int; uniform vec3 color; varying vec3 vPos; varying vec3 vNor; varying vec2 vUv; void main() { gl_FragColor = vec4(color * max(dot(vNor, vec3(0.707, 0.0, -0.707)), 0.1), 1.0); }
